title: Ampex H.S 100 video disc recorder
brief_description: Ampex H.S 100 video disc recorder. One of the first units used on Australian television to facilitate ‘slow mo’ replays of football action. Disc capacity approx 9 seconds. Includes one x spare 15” disc. Circa 1960s/70s
